name: Laureato 42mm Chronograph
description: Add the item you wish to purchase to your bag and proceed through the checkout to the payment stage.                     Select "V12 Finance" and choose from one of the available plans. We have a number of terms available over 6, 9, 12, 18, 24, 36, 48 or 60 months. You will only be able to select the payment terms applicable depending on the value of your order.                     You can also increase your deposit at this stage if you wish to make your monthly payments lower.                     Once selected, review your terms and when you are ready, proceed to V12's website via the "Proceed to V12 Finance" button.You will then be taken to the application form for your Interest Free Credit plan on V12's website. Enter all of the information that is applicable to you.                     We will then ask you for your credit card details to place the deposit for your order. Once you are happy with everything, click 'Place Deposit'. Deposits cannot be paid using Paypal or Gift Cards.                     The finance company will process your application and once accepted, we will receive notification. We will ONLY despatch your order once we have received notification that your                         application has been successful.
